Producer: Robert Farrelly, Peter Farrelly, Bradley Thomas
Screenwriter: Robert Farrelly, Peter Farrelly, Mike Cerrone
Sound Mix: SDDS, Dolby Digital, DTS, Surround, Dolby SR
Synopsis: Meet Charlie Baileygates, a 17-year veteran of the Rhode Island police force. Charlie is mild-mannered, hard-working, always helpful, and a devoted and loving father to three sons. Unfortunately, Charlie has Split Personality Disorder, and when he runs out of his medication ... Meet Hank Baileygates (Jim Carrey), Charlie's hyper-aggressive alter-ego. Hank's got a filthy mouth, drinks like a fish, breaks skulls and loves dirty, dirty sex.
Title: Me, Myself & Irene
